name: Everlight (Jose)
description:
Everlight is an RPG adventures game where you control a knight of the Everlight order. Your quest: to eliminate all evil in the ancient ruins of a prison.

Gather your torch and sword and prepare yourself to fight against monster and the darkness itself. Use spells to protect yourself or deal damage at the cost of your own torchlight but beware, complete darkness will harm you.

A bit about myself:

My name's Jose and  I'm from Spain!

I've studied computer science and a master degree in Unity3D and this game is my very first game. I'm not an artist, just a programmer, so all the art in the game comes from different assets and collaborations. 

I hope you enjoy my work! Any positive feedback is welcome ^_^
